channel.title: retail banking division on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in retail banking division on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 RBC Bank Logo
RBC Bank is the trading name of RBC Bank, N.A., the United States-based retail banking division of the Royal Bank of Canada which is targeted toward Canadian snowbirds, expatriates, and frequent tourists. Despite its limited reach, RBC Bank is a federally chartered bank, thus its trading name bears “N.A.” letters. The brand name was originally used by RBC Bank USA, formed in 2001 when RBC acquired the Raleigh, North Carolina-based Centura Bank.
You can download theRBClogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: RBC
item.description: RBC Bank is the trading name of RBC Bank, N.A., the United States-based retail banking division of the Royal Bank of Canada which is targeted toward Canadian snowbirds, expatriates, and frequent tourists. Despite its limited reach, RBC Bank is a federally chartered bank, thus its trading name bears “N.A.” letters. The brand name was originally used by RBC Bank USA, formed in 2001 when RBC acquired the Raleigh, North Carolina-based Centura Bank.
